DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase 3, open-label, non-randomized, clinical trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of FE 999303 (Testosterone gel) in adult hypogonadal males.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Testosterone Gel in Adult Hypogonadal Males
DOC.criteria: Males between 1875 years of age Two fasting serum testosterone levels <300 ng/dL Previous use of the study drug History of prostate or breast cancer ProstateSpecific Antigen (PSA) â‰¥3 ng/mL Subject is sexually active and not willing to use adequate contraception
